account.bind_web: Link your account to an e-mail address

account_bind_web.help:
## Information

Linking your account to an e-mail address allows you to play the browser version of Rising Constellation using this account.

We will send you a confirmation e-mail with next steps.

instance.admin_warning: Note: you are not the owner of this instance. You only see this because you are an administrator.
instance.ea_note: Rising Constellation is in early access. The number of players may be relatively small at certain times. To find opponents quickly don't hesitate to come to the game's Discord.
instance.hide_members: Hide the members of this faction
instance.join_money_info: For free accounts, Legacy matches cost quadrils. Purchasing quadrils isn't yet possible, but it will be soon.
instance.owner_warning: You see this because you are the owner of this game.

menu.ea_p1: Rising Constellation is in early access, joining us on Discord is the best way of finding players.
menu.ea_p2: A good portion of the game is translated into English, but don't hesitate to ask questions directly in game or on Discord if some things are not clear.
menu.ea_p3: Every Monday, end of the day, we release a new version of the game with new features and patches. Detailed information about these updates is available on Discord.
menu.epic_p1: Every Tuesday evening at 8:45pm UTC+1 there is an official Flash game with rewards.
menu.epic_p2: Flash matches are only available to players who own the full version of the game.
menu.legacy_p1: A Legacy game (about 30 days) will start Wednesday 14th of July 2021, 8pm CEST. We’re still improving this mode and this test is intended to improve game elements balance and calibration.
menu.tactical_p1: Every Wednesday evening at 8pm UTC+1 an official TACTIC game is launched for a duration of 5 days.
menu.web_p1: Play Rising Constellation in your browser by getting to the “Settings” (top right of the screen once you’ve clicked on “Play”) and link your email address, you will then be able to connect to our web portal.
menu.web_p2: Please note that for now Chrome (and Chrome-based browsers) is the only fully supported browser.

newplayer.earlyaccess:
## About Early Access

Rising Constellation is still under development. Not all features are available yet.

Feel free to ask the community for help on our Steam page or on our Discord.
newplayer.welcome:
## Welcome to Rising Constellation

**Create your character!** Characters are the empire leaders you will be playing as.

* * *

Don't worry, you can change it later.

play.ea_disclaimer:
## Rising Constellation is in Early Access.

It can therefore be difficult to quickly find players for a short flash game. We recommend that you join us on our Discord to find players more easily.

Don't hesitate to start your own Flash game and use it as a sandbox to familiarize yourself with the game. To do so, create a new game directly and try out the basic game mechanics.

fast.description: Small teams and a merciless struggle. Perfect to blow off some steam!
fast.subtitle: 1-2 hours
fast.title: Flash

play.free_locked_content: Flash matches are not available to those with free accounts. In order to play all match types (without having to pay in quadrils), you can purchase the game on Steam.
play.free_locked_link: Purchase the game on Steam and play for free

medium.description: A strategic and intense team game lasting a long day!
medium.subtitle: 8-12 hours
medium.title: Tactic

new.button_seed: Use the same seed as the scenario

start_settings.when_full: As soon as all spots are filled

slow.description: Roleplay and diplomacy in a lengthy game.
slow.subtitle: 30-40 days
slow.title: Legacy

tutorial.description: Try and learn how to play Rising Constellation.
tutorial.title: Koshaks Academy

profile.description:
## Characters

Characters are the empire leaders you play as in Rising Constellation.
profile.title: Characters

standings.description:
## About

The rankings are updated after each ranked game.

The elements of the rankings list are profiles.
standings.title: Rankings

tutorial.description_1: The Koshaks Academy - situated at the heart of Syn territories but whose reputation spreads well beyond - trains future rulers, dynasts, in the arts of politics and intrigue.
tutorial.description_2: This sector is only accessible to you. You will be alone and will be able to familiarize yourself with the game. An interactive tutorial will guide you through Rising Constellation's gameplay mechanisms.
tutorial.title:
**Koshaks**

**Academy**

upgrade.free_info:
## Free version

You can only play Legacy matches.

Legacy matches cost 500 quadrils.
upgrade.steam_id_info:
## Help

Getting your Steam ID will allow us to link your account with the Steam version of the game. Once the upgrade completed, you will receive a Steam key that will allow you to activate your product and play both the browser and Steam versions with the same account.

To find your Steam ID, go to this web address [store.steampowered.com/account](https://store.steampowered.com/account/) and log in. Your Steam ID is located at the top of the page, below your account name, as shown in the image below. Put only the number in the text field.

![steam help](media/steam-id-help.png)
upgrade.steam_id_input: Enter your Steam ID (follow the instructions below)
upgrade.title: Account upgrade and Steam product key
upgrade.upgrade_info:
## Full game

You can join all available match types.

Joining a match is free.

You can create custom Flash matches.
